events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will start reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience as a developer.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview went well. We are impressed by your software development skills and problem-solving ability.
Thank you for your quick response and availability for the upcoming technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-12 at 10:00 AM UTC to assess your coding and system design skills.
You have successfully completed the technical interview. Your innovative solutions impressed the engineering panel.
We have scheduled an HR interview on 2024-05-15 at 3:00 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview concluded positively with a thorough discussion about your career goals and our work environment.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, reflecting your skills and interview performance.
Thank you for your feedback and questions regarding the offer. We are happy to clarify any concerns you might have.
We are delighted that you have accepted our offer and are excited to welcome you to the engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun, including access to all tools, training sessions, and introduction to your team.
The hiring process for the Software Engineer position is now complete. We look forward to your contributions.
